name: Focus, Archer!
description:
In a dystopian future, the rebel Pugna crosses paths everyday with the Occi Co., a corporation that control and intoxicate her hometown. When she's attacked by a group of their grunts, Pugna loses the use of her legs in a fall. Paralyzed from the waist down and locked in a mysterious building, she must solve puzzles designed by the evil corporation in each one of its floors with only a high-tech bow and arrow developed by Occi co., and at the same time deal with her temper problems.

"Focus, Archer!" is an isometric puzzle with retro visuals reminescent from games of the Playstation 1 and Nintendo 64 era. By the interaction between their bow with arrows that ricochets on walls and the elements arranged on the levels, the player progresses through an abandoned building now being used for tests from floor to floor, solving a puzzle in each one.

CAFY Games consists of Cléo Rocha, André Mechetto, Fernanda Shimada and Yukio Hayashi. This is an academic project. This build is a Work in Progress and may not reflect a possible final version of the game.

Controls:

WASD - Rotate

Left Mouse Button - Aim/Shoot

Right Mouse Button - Control camera

Enter - Skip cutscene
